database_fixed_field_perms.comment: Contains a JSON object of fixed field permissions.
database_fixed_field_perms.name: database_fixed_field_perms

database_page_id.comment: Page ID this database is used on (if any)
database_page_id.name: database_page_id

database_use_as_page_title.name: database_use_as_page_title
database_use_as_page_title.comment: Use database name as page title, or retain page title

category_fields.comment: JSON object of permitted form fields to show.
category_fields.name: category_fields

field_display_commentform.comment: Determines if this field should show and be editable on the comment reply form.
field_display_commentform.name: field_display_commentform

field_display_json.comment: JSON array of custom display HTML
field_display_json.name: field_display_json

page_js_css_ids.comment: JSON array storing CSS and JS template IDs for inclusion on this page.
page_js_css_ids.name: page_js_css_ids

template_file_object.comment: The URL for the file object that corresponds with this item.
template_file_object.name: template_file_object
